page.title: 04LOCAL HOUSING
page.content:
At the North end of Angmering, most of the houses are semi-detached, at an average cost of Â£41,520 with 8 rooms, and terraced houses at an average cost of Â£39,900 with 7 rooms. They are in modern estates, built 10-20 years ago which have been growing rapidly as the population of Angmering increases.
The 1981 census showed a population of 5 300 in Angmering alone, so more houses must be built to accommodate the influx of people. There are only a few detached houses in Angmering as they are more expensive.
North of the A27 there are more detached houses. Some, like the decoy cottage, date back to the 1600's. A typical house in the area has 3 bedrooms, a spacious kitchen, lounge, dining room, garage and garden.
